item.title: Using a neural network control policy for rapid switching between beam parameters in an FEL
item.description: A. L. Edelen, S. G. Biedron J. P. Edelen, S. V. Milton, P. J. M. van der Slot. Colorado State University Element Aero Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory Los Alamos National Laboratory University of Twente 38th International Free Electron Laser Conference. Abstract FEL user facilities often must accommodate requests for a variety of beam parameters. This usually requires skilled operators to tune the machine, reducing the amount of available time for users.
